text:
Mr. James Miles
Prudue University
Lafayette, Indiana
Page 2
October 7, 1957
So, thanks to both of you — I*m delighted that our committee members take the pains to
remind us of things like this, and that they read what we send out. Honest, I'm glad
you called this to our attention.
Hope to see both of you in St. Louis — OCTOBER 29-NOVEMBER 1.♦ .HOTEL STATLER.
Regards,
Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
HEH: jg
CC: Mr. Stewart S. Howe
